publicationStmt.pubPlace: London, UK and Los Angeles, California, USA
publicationStmt.publisher: Digital Library Program, University of California, Los Angeles

availability.p: The originals of these documents are held by the Bodleian Library, University of Oxford, which has made them available to the Livingstone Online project. (c) 2011.

msIdentifier.collection: Bodleian Library of Commonwealth and African Studies at Rhodes House, University of Oxford

projectDesc.p: David Livingstone writes this portion of his diary entries over the recto and verso (RHOLMSSAfrs16-1_001r_172ar and RHOLMSSAfrs16-1_001v_172av) of a single page of unmarked stationary. This stationary was originally sent to Livingstone along with a separate envelope (RHOLMSSAfrs16-1_002r_172br and RHOLMSSAfrs16-1_002v_172bv) that Livingstone has also used to record diary entries. RHOLMSSAfrs16-1_002v_172bv bears the handwritten address "Dr. Kirk Consulate Zanzibar care of H.M. Commissioner Seychelles". Livingstone's text is what is transcribed and represented in the Text Encoding Initiative (TEI) P5 XML encoding.

revisionDesc.change: 2011-06-12 Adrian S. Wisnicki initial transcription and XML encoding.

figure.figDesc: Livingstone has written a series of squiggles to correct ink flow across the top portion of the page
Livingstone here records a series of calculations that cover the bottom portion of the page
